name: Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies
author: Stephanie Watts
summary: A double dose of peanut butter!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment  paper
Mix flour, baking powder and salt in a  medium bowl
In a large bowl, beat butter, peanut butter, and vanilla with an electric mixer until well blended
Scrape down the sides of the bowl
Stir in half of the dry ingredients into the mixture
Add eggs one at a time, blending well after each addition
For each cookie, roll 1 heaping tablespoon full of dough into 1 3/4 inch diameter ball
Arrange balls 2 1/2 inches apart on prepared baking sheets
Using the back of fork, flatten dough balls and form a crosshatch on  tops
Bake cookies until dry on top, about 15 minutes
Cool cookies on baking sheets for 5 minutes
Using a spatula, transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool completely
